content: **cool crochet mini bag** or purse made of t-shirt yarn or tube yarn is a must have for a pinterest summer outfit this crochet mini bag is a perfect summer crochet project and works up quickly in a few hours **yarns and tools** * crochet hook 12 mm or 10 mm progress keeper stitch marker and a threading needle * any t-shirt yarn or tube yarn pick two colors of your choice bubblegum pink and orange in the photo for example hoooked zpagetti hoooked ribbon xl solids paintbox yarns recycled t-shirt lankava eko tube yarn * yardage one big ball of each color should be enough * gauge 6 single_crochet and 5 single_crochet row in 10 cm 4 **terminology and skill level** this easy level crochet bag pattern is written in us crochet terminology and it includes written instructions **find out more** feel free to share your crochet mini bag on instagram and tag @swoolify so i can see your amazing colorful bags you can find more information about this crochet bag pattern on my website 1 and more crochet patterns in my ravelry store or for free on my website swoolnordicdesign com 2 find also two other crochet bag patterns on the same pattern webpage crochet your own cool crochet bag this summer 1 https //swoolnordicdesign com/2024/07/19/crochet-handbag-free-pattern/ 2 https //swoolnordicdesign com/
